profileAlternative.name: Habib Adam
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist at TransferWise
profileAlternative.summary:
I have worked in analytical and highly quantitative roles – spanning investment markets, insurance pricing, marketing performance analytics, and general consulting. My experience has covered a range of challenging and unique analytical projects where I have been afforded opportunities to work with a variety of different data sets, design classification and regression models, and develop optimization algorithms. These projects have provided me with hands-on experience and familiarity in statistical modelling and analysis, machine learning, data warehousing, process automation (predominately using R, Python, and SQL).

Some of my personal work can be found at:
http://cargocollective.com/theswishcheese
